meanings.definition: Showing excessive cleverness or skill in creating or solving problems.
meanings.sent1: The overingenious solution to the puzzle impressed everyone with its cleverness.
meanings.sent2: She was known for her overingenious ways of coming up with new ideas at work.
meanings.sent3: His overingenious plan to avoid doing chores ended up causing more trouble than it solved.
meanings.sent4: The overingenious mechanism in the clock made it a marvel of engineering.
meanings.sent5: The overingenious design of the building made it stand out among the rest.

meanings.definition: Too clever or inventive for one's own good.
meanings.sent1: Being overingenious in his excuses, he often found himself in trouble.
meanings.sent2: Her overingenious schemes sometimes backfired on her.
meanings.sent3: His overingenious plan to skip school ended up getting him caught by his parents.
meanings.sent4: The overingenious strategy seemed brilliant at first but led to unexpected consequences.
meanings.sent5: The overingenious invention seemed like a breakthrough until it caused more problems than it solved.
